description: UTZ files are stored in a compressed Zip format. They contain an .XML configuration file named Theme.xml as well as other files, such as .PNG images and .MP3 , .MID , and .M4A audio files. Theme.xml specifies the user interface layout and playback properties for the packaged theme files.
The UTZ format is used by UIQ, a program based on Symbian OS that controls the graphical user interface of mobile phone devices.
NOTE: Sony Ericsson Themes Creator has been discontinued.
